website_summaries.verdict: Pricey, but worth the investment when it comes to keeping your color-treated hair looking and feeling its best.
pros: This shampoo is made by a brand that specializes in products for color-treated hair, and contains ingredients that prevent fading and enhance shine

cons: Users have differing opinions on the scent – some find it refreshing, others didn't like it
Rare reports of rash or breakouts
Most expensive option on our shortlist
